title: Madeon at the Melkweg
description: After a stunning performance at Second Sky, Madeon has confirmed an all new live show, 30-city Good Faith Live tour will head to North America after stops in London, Amsterdam and Paris.

title: Illenium at the Bundum Forum
description: Nick Miller, also known as Illenium, is a one of a kind producer who I got the luck to see at the Ogden Theater in Denver, Colorado. He can remix just about any song as well as create his own music.

title: Lake Affect Concert
description: Damon Dotson's annual Lake Affect concert combines the best of both ideas into one big, blowout event: Lake Affect. Lake Affect, an outdoor concert on the water, is set to drop anchor in Little Miller's Bay in West Lake Okoboji on Saturday, July 1, for the 11th time.
